title: His Momma Named Him Lakeith, I'ma Call Him Darius
itunes:title: His Momma Named Him Lakeith, I'ma Call Him Darius
description:
THU 11/10 - Lakeith Stanfield joins The Breakfast Club. He plays Darius on FX's hit new show "Atlanta" and he also played Snoop in "Straight Outta Compton". We talk about Donald Glover coming up with the idea for "Atlanta", how he got the role, his rapping alter-ego and an awkward freestyle. Meanwhile in Donkey District, a big hee-haw goes to Stephen A. Smith for being shocked at Kaepernick choosing not to vote.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.

We talk about Donald Glover coming up with the idea for "Atlanta", how he got the role, his rapping alter-ego and an awkward freestyle. Meanwhile in Donkey District, a big hee-haw goes to Stephen A.
